title: Linux ss Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux ss command, learn its syntax, and discover practical examples to analyze network connections, socket statistics, and states.

meta.title: Linux ss Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux ss command, learn its syntax, and discover practical examples to analyze network connections, socket statistics, and states.
meta.keywords: Linux, ss command, network connections, socket statistics, network analysis, networking tools

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Syntax of the ss Command

verify.name: Verify the ss command syntax
verify.hint: Make sure you can run the `ss` command with the `-t` option to display TCP sockets.

steps.title: Explore Network Connections Using the ss Command

verify.name: Verify the ss command usage
verify.hint: Make sure you can run the `ss` command with the `-a`, `-l`, and `-ltp` options to display all network connections, listening sockets, and process information for listening sockets, respectively.

steps.title: Analyze Socket Statistics and States with the ss Command

verify.name: Verify the ss command for socket statistics and states
verify.hint: Make sure you can run the `ss` command with the `-t -i` and `-o` options to display detailed TCP socket information and socket states, respectively.
